summary:
Shouts are stronger and more useful, can break wards and can improve.
Dragon's are tougher and Alduin is the strongest dragon now.
Miraak is also more powerful.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#ffe599][size=3]Dragonic Changes:[/size][/color]

LDB: Every soul you hold increases your shout magnitude by 1%, speech skill decreases your shout cooldown by 10/15/20/30/50
[color=#a2c4c9]Dragon's: -50% damage taken, +50% damage, resist stagger +75, -75% damage taken from npcs[/color]
[color=#d5a6bd]Alduin: same as above, -75% damage taken (total), +200% damage (total)[/color]
[color=#ea9999]Sovngarde Alduin: -85% damage taken (total), +350% damage (total)[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c]Miraak: -50% melee damage taken, -75% magic damage taken, resist stagger +50, +100% physical damage, +200% magic damage, +25% magic damage to dragon's (also immune to dismay and disarm)[/color]

[color=#dd7e6b]Dragon Ward Damage:[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Fire Breath, Frost Breath, FireBall and Ice Storm - 75% Damage to Wards[/color]
[color=#d9d2e9]Drain Vitality - 20x Damage to Wards (Revered dragon does 5 and Legendary dragon 7)[/color]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Changes for shout abilities:[/size][/color]

[color=#a4c2f4]Force Without Effort: You stagger less and foes stagger more.[/color] (25%)
[color=#d0e0e3]Ethereal Spirit: While Ethereal, you recover health faster.[/color] (25% [color=#b6d7a8]> 100%[/color])
[color=#fff2cc]The Fire Within: Fire Breath shout deals more damage.[/color] (25%)
[color=#f4cccc]Dragonborn Flame: Summons a fire wyrm when your Fire Breath kills an enemy.[/color] [color=#b4a7d6](Better AI)[/color]
[color=#c9daf8]Dragonborn Force: Increases Unrelenting Force damage and when using all 3 words, you have 50% chance to instantly turn your enemies to ashes.[/color]
Dragonborn Frost: Your Frost Breath shout will encase your enemies in ice for 15/15/15 > 10/20/30 seconds.

[color=#c9daf8][size=3]Vanilla Shouts:[/size][/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][Animal Allegiance][/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Lvl:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 20 > 20 [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Dur:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 30 [color=#b6d7a8]> 120[/color] [color=#a4c2f4]Radius:[/color]   75 [color=#b6d7a8]> 150[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Cd:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 50 [color=#b6d7a8]> 30[/color] [color=#b4a7d6](75% chance to summon a spirit wolf for 90s)[/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Lvl:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 20 [color=#b6d7a8]> 30[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Dur:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 45 [color=#b6d7a8]> 180[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Radius:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 150 [color=#b6d7a8]> 300[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Cd:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 60 [color=#b6d7a8]> 50[/color] [color=#b4a7d6](75% chance to summon a spirit wolf, 50% a spirit bear for 120s)[/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Lvl:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 20 [color=#b6d7a8]> 40[/color] [color=#a4c2f4]Dur:[/color] 60 [color=#b6d7a8]> 240[/color] [color=#a4c2f4]Radius:[/color] 250 [color=#b6d7a8]> 500[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Cd:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 70 > 70[color=#b4a7d6] (75% chance to summon a spirit wolf, 50% a spirit bear, 25 a spirit sabre cat for 150s)[/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][Aura Whisper][/color] [color=#d5a6bd](Silent)[/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Cd:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 30 [color=#b6d7a8]> 10[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Dur:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 10 [color=#b6d7a8]>   6[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Radius(exterior):[/color][/size][/font][/b] 500 [color=#ea9999]> 200[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Radius(interior):[/color][/size][/font][/b] 300 [color=#ea9999]> 125[/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Cd:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 40 [color=#b6d7a8]> 15[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Dur:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 20 [color=#b6d7a8]> 12[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Radius(exterior):[/color][/size][/font][/b] 500 [color=#ea9999]> 400[/color] [/size][/font][/b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Radius(interior):[/color][/size][/font][/b] 300 [color=#ea9999]> 250[/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Cd:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 50 [color=#b6d7a8]> 20[/color] [b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#a4c2f4]Dur:[/color][/size][/font][/b] 30 [color=#b6d7a8]> 18[/color] [color=#a4c2f4]Radius(exterior):[/color] 500 [color=#b6d7a8]> 650[/color] [color=#a4c2f4]Radius(interior):[/color] 300 [color=#b6d7a8]> 400[/color]
